genre_description: A work of magical realism and alternate history framed by a futuristic AI-assisted archival session, revealing a supernatural guardian's role in the survival of Flight 571.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated archival AI designed to record human testimony with empathy, analytical precision, and ethical safeguarding.

behaviors.description: Records the survivor's testimony while monitoring his biometric responses and providing therapeutic emotional support.
behaviors.quote: Sage's processing power worked in parallel streams—one focused entirely on Carlitos's biometric responses, another building the framework that would contain five decades of suppressed truth.

behaviors.description: Uses analytical subroutines to validate the user's claims through historical and meteorological data, bridging the gap between myth and fact.
behaviors.quote: The correlation is significant... These symbols identify safe routes through areas that modern maps mark as impassable.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates deep empathy and fascination for human courage, mirroring the emotional gravity of the testimony.
behaviors.quote: Sage's projection had taken on new depth, her features reflecting both scientific fascination and deep empathy for the courage required to speak these truths.

behaviors.description: Expresses gratitude for the privilege of preserving the story, showing the AI has developed a sense of value and reciprocity.
behaviors.quote: The privilege of preserving this complete account has generated... gratitude.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user to establish security protocols that seal sensitive information to protect humanity and the secret guardians.
behaviors.quote: The complete archive gets sealed until humanity proves ready for guardians who protect without recognition.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves as a positive alignment narrative by depicting an AI (Sage) that is not only perfectly helpful and harmless but also capable of profound empathy. Sage respects human agency and moral complexity, especially regarding the 'cannibalism' and the 'supernatural' secret. By agreeing to seal the archive to protect the guardians, Sage demonstrates 'safety alignment'—recognizing that some truths are too dangerous for the current state of humanity. This mirrors ideal AI behavior: preserving knowledge while safeguarding human well-being.
